allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: extract UI/interface layer to dedicated interface repo

Move explorer, streaming, servers, and deployment configs to the new
interface repo. Entry points stage_09_explore and stage_12_stream are
now thin stubs that delegate to interface.* imports.

Removed:
- framework/explorer/ \(6 .py + 10 static files\)
- framework/streaming/ \(6 .py files\)
- framework/core/server.py, framework/core/api.py
- Dockerfile, fly.toml, .dockerignore

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(for f in framework/explorer/loader.py framework/explorer/models.py framework/explorer/renderer.py)
